Name: the New Colony Region
Description: The New Colony Region is a collection of worlds within the Capellan Marches rimward of the Capellan Confederation jointly colonized by the Magistracy of Canopus and the Taurian Concordat. Interestingly, some of the settlements existed even before the official formation of the region itself.
ReputationStatements: Clearly, we are at your mercy here, so I beg you to stop fighting us. If you want money or salvage, I can offer you those with this contract.
Please, the New Colony Region desperately needs you to stop fighting against us. I have been authorized to offer this contract in the hopes of a future together.
Commander, the New Colony Region faces pressure from other factionsâ€”we would really appreciate you considering this contract to perform a task for us.
The New Colony Region greets you, Commander. I can offer you this contract for your consideration.
Commander, we acknowledge your assistance in the past and offer you this contract in the hopes of continuing our beneficial relations.
Greetings, Commander. You have assisted the Alliance against our numerous foes, and we ask you to do so again, adequately compensated, of course.
Hello, my friend, It is good to see you. The Alliance has a task that I can't entrust to anyone else, and I hope you will accept this contract.
MissionSuccessStatements: Well done, Commander. You have completed the required objectives, and I am happy to remit the full contracted amount to your account.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: Commander, we required the primary objective to be completed. However, seeing as you did at least make an attempt, I will forward a partial payment to your account.
BadFaithFailureStatements: How can you expect to be taken seriously as a mercenary if you can't even complete a simple contract? I hope you don't expect payment, as none will be forthcoming.
